attributes.action: Fair Road Tax for Motorcycles & the environment
attributes.additional_details:
Motor cycles are being treated unfairly by the amount of Road tax paid compared to new small Cars , a new small car pays approximately the same road tax as a new small motor cycle & less road tax than most medium motorcycles.
A car requires more road space , parking area & bigger parking areas than motorcycles , which is less Green causing more brownfield sites for Car parking , car sales/repairs.... etc.
Cars being bigger & heavier also means more damage to Nature, roads & the environment  than a motorcycle................
This petition is for a fairer Road Tax for Motorcycles as they are kinder for the Environment................. Please sign for a reduction/ fair Road Tax .
